description: larger rectangular panel with narrow strip of same length sewn at bottom; uneven stripes of pinks with white and orange stripes; purple, pink, orange and white diamonds; white and grey ovals; and white wedges; tan bands at two sides on back; "A" stitched in black at one corner
inscription:

at one corner on back, in black ink: [(illegible) 52 / (illegible)]
title: Study for UN Curtain
